Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appearing immediately after 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that are followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences to 'Accepted + Wait - User' occurrences
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + Wait - User' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to cases containing 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Average number of times 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appears per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities that occur before any 'Completed + In Call' activity in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of direct transitions from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appears but 'Completed + In Call' does not
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in high-duration variants (performance > 1,000,000)
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences in cases that never reach 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to total 'Accepted + Wait' type activities (including 'Accepted + Wait', 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation')
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Number of distinct cases in which 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurs
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that are preceded by at least one 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of variants starting with 'Accepted + In Progress' and later including 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of all wait-related activities accounted for by 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in comparison to 'Completed + In Call' within the same process instances
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs
